entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming south 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries beginning in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 50 gusting to 70 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 28 January 2023
